messages.text: Hello, following your recent eviction request, our agents are ready to intervene. Can you please give us the name of the correct establishment ?

text: Yes of course. At last, I won’t have to see their ugly face on my way to work. Please proceed to the eviction of

messages.text: Hi Mrs Principal. Good news, the funding for this year’s class trip is finally secured ! I just bought the last ten lotto tickets, from Kevin who struggled a bit to sell his. Only one question left, have you decided where the class trip should be ?

text: In my great Principal wisdom, I thought long and hard about this important question. I came to the conclusion that it would be best for the happiness and growth of the children that you take them to

messages.text: I just had the cops come to the dealership with an eviction notice! Do you think it’s related to the embezzlement operation ?

Don’t forget to switch the cages today. The Pandas need to go in cage 5 and the Tiger in cage 10. Don’t forget, you know how angry they get when they eat tiger food… We don’t want another day like last friday.

Everything is ready for the zoo robbery Boss. The disguises are on point and the key seems to work. I can’t believe we’ll finally get our own panda. I can’t wait to taste it, it will be perfect with a red wine. The panda are still in cage 10, right?

text: Heating up the grill as we speak.

messages.text: CEO of Land Robber here, I am opening a brand new dealership today, I want 400 cases of your best oysters to be delivered before this evening. Quickly, I am a busy man.
Yes of course. That will be $7.560. What is the delivery address?

text: You don’t eve know my address ? Do you know who I am ? And you call yourself luxury… It’s

messages.text: Don’t forget to pull the turkey out of the fridge before I get home! Love you.
Sure thing.
I won’t be here this evening, I’m skating with the O’llie family.
Take care.
Are you the one who just ordered 4800 Oysters to the house ??
I just finished the budgets, you’ll get gas reimbursement before the end of the week..
Perfect.
By the way, can you be a bit more mindful about your driving ? The group of italian tourists complained last week.
I will. But just so you know, they were nuns. The constant singing was a bit distracting.
No worries. Don’t forget, tomorrow you gotta pick up the europeans at the airport at 6 AM. After that, it’s breakfast at the Coffee Corner, gift shop visit, and then the zoo.
Sure thing.
Have you checked the news ? The zoo is closed, there is an investigation apparently. What should we do ?
I just finished the budgets, you’ll get gas reimbursement before the end of the week.
Perfect.
By the way, can you be a bit more mindful about your driving ? The group of italian tourists complained last week.
I will. But just so you know, they were nuns. The constant singing was a bit distracting.
No worries. Don’t forget, tomorrow you gotta pick up the europeans at the airport at 6 AM. After that, it’s breakfast at the Coffee Corner, gift shop visit, and then the zoo.
Sure thing.
Have you checked the news ? The zoo is closed, a tiger is on the loose apparently. What should we do ?
We heard report of a hacker intercepting communications and making quite a stir in the city. Patrol, go on and apprehend them.
Received. Where are they operating ?
The End.
Thanks for playing !
(Now please, would you be so kind as to close this unauthorized access ?)
